      • SetWorldCoordinate

        public void SetWorldCoordinate(float x)
        Set the world coordinate system. World height is based on world width and the window aspec ratio.
        Parameters:
        x - - The number of world x coordinates that fit inside the window.

      • SetWorldCoordinate

                               float y)
        Set the world coordinate system.
        Parameters:
        x - - The number of world x coordinates that fit inside the window.
        y - - The number of world y coordinates that fit inside the window.

      • checkWorldBound

        public boolean checkWorldBound(GameObject obj,
                               World.BoundCollidedStatus whichBound)
        Check if the given object is not inside of the given world bound.
        Parameters:
        obj - - The game object to check if it is not entirely inside the world.
        whichBound - - The world bound to check the given object against.
        Returns:
        - The side of the world that the object is overlapping.

      • isInsideWorldBound

        public boolean isInsideWorldBound(GameObject obj)
        Check if any part of the primitive is inside the world.
        Parameters:
        obj - - The game object to check if it is inside.
        Returns:
        - True if any part of the primitive is inside the world, otherwise false.
